document_name: Presidential Decree 16/2015 on the Structure of the Environment and Forestry Ministry
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/IDN/2015/IDN-2015-01-01-Presidential Decree 16_2015 on the Structure of the Environment and Forestry Ministry_93b460fe2c9c508d05f76bf37faac0bb.pdf
document_description: This decree revokes and declares invalid Presidential Decree 62/2013 which created Indonesia's REDD+ body. It specifies that the REDD+ body and the country's National Council on Climate Change are both to become part of the Directorate General of Climate Change in the Ministry of Forestry and Environment.
